attributes.action: I would like the sexual abuse towards kids to be punished with prison for life
attributes.additional_details: Is your right as parents,and leaders to protect our childrens  from people who hurt inocente little humans who can talk ,I understand that is impossible to prevent a sexual abuse but for someone who sexually abused a child and ruined all his life without him/her asking for this isn’t fair.this people won’t stop sexually abuse kids for few years of jail.Please I am beginning you to think about the pain a kid is having during the abuse is just awful and horrible they should never know that pain
attributes.background: I would like the government to protect our kids ,our new generation and 3,6 or 9 years of jail isn’t enough for someone who ruin the life of a child who have done nothing wrong as long the law won’t give a proper punishment for this people who are sexually abusing childrens they will never stop
